item.title: Swiss government slashes growth outlook as Trump tariffs put 'heavy burden' on economy
item.description: The risks are mounting for the Swiss economy as the country’s goods face one of the Trump administration’s most punitive tariff rates.

item.title: CEOs of Wells Fargo and Pfizer caution the U.S. could lose its edge to China without innovation
item.description: Speaking at CNBC's Invest in America Forum, the CEOs said the U.S. still leads in many sectors, but inconsistent policy and underinvestment is ceding ...

item.title: Tariffs are pushing prices higher and consumers are feeling the hit, Fed's Beige Book shows
item.description: Companies are caught between absorbing the costs or passing them onto customers, according to a Federal Reserve report.

item.title: Fed's Powell suggests tightening program could end soon, opens door to rate cuts
item.description: Fed Chair Jerome Powell on Tuesday said the central bank is nearing a point where it will stop reducing the size of its bond holdings.

item.title: There's a shocking disparity between how high-income and low-income earners feel about the economy
item.description: New JPMorgan data shows how Americans in different income brackets perceive the economy.
